Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Okay lets tackle this problem step by step So I need to go through the given event log and figure out which activities are used multiple times in the same case but with different contexts Then rename those activities to reflect the context

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First Ill look through each case Lets start with Case C001 The activities here are Initiate Request Verify Documents Call Customer Submit Additional Verify Documents again and Approve Request Hmm Verify Documents appears twice

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The first time its the agent checking existing documents and the second time after the customer uploads a new ID scan So the context here is that the first verification is before the additional document is received and the second is after Therefore renaming to Initial Document Verification and Post Upload Verification makes sense

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Next Case C002 The activities here are Initiate Request Verify Documents Call Customer Adjust Account Call Customer twice and Approve Request

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The first Call Customer is outbound to clarify a discrepancy The second Call Customer is a follow up to confirm adjustments So the names should be Clarify Discrepancy and Follow up Call for Confirmation

Name: Pattern Recognition - NE
Text: Case C003 has Initiate Request Verify Documents twice Call Customer twice Adjust Account and Approve Request

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: The first Verify Documents here is physical ID check The second one is after an account adjustment Then Call Customer first time is to have the customer return and the second time its a follow up So Physical Verification for the initial check and Post Adjustment Verification after the account is tweaked For the calls Retrieve Customer and Follow up for Adjustment Confirmation

Name: Validation - NE
Text: Now Submit Additional in C001 is only once so no renaming there Adjust Account in C002 and C003 both refer to internal adjustments so they can stay as Adjust Account since the context is similar across cases but different in placement But wait in C001 after the call they adjust the account internally So its per case but the activity name doesnt change So leave it as is

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: I need to make sure that each activity names context is clear based on the event details For example in C001s second Verify Documents the context is after the customer uploaded the ID scan Similarly in C003 the second Verify Documents is after adjusting the account For the renaming Ill adjust each occurrence based on the specific case and the timeline of events The new names should indicate the purpose at each step For example Post Upload Document Verification to show its after the document has been uploaded

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: I should present the revised log with these new activity names and then justify each change with the contextual clues from the log entries The key is that each new name should disambiguate the activitys role in different phases of the process
